page.title: 10Worlingworth May Day 1985
page.content: The village May Day fete was regarded by all concerned as a very pleasing occasion.The entertainments included various games of skill or chance offering prizes of wine,goldfish & teddy bears.A suitcase circus performed & a very precise model of a stationary steam engine,made by a villager was driving a model elevator known locally as a "pitcher".Races were run,a pet show was held,a large inflatable plastic envelope was bounced upon by the children & wooden balls were thrown at coconuts.The Brownies entertained with traditional maypole dancing,twisting coloured ribbons about a vertical post. The occasion raised 583.58 pounds for Worlingworth Community Council funds.
